citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on 14-Oct-
20.
The inspector called contact phone numbers on file and was unable to reach anyone or leave a message. The inspector
made in person contact with employees at the facility who confirmed no authorized person was available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on 14-Oct-
20. 
The inspector called contact phone numbers on file and was unable to reach anyone or leave a message.  The inspector 
made in person contact with employees at the facility who confirmed no authorized person was available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
